skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class Destroyer - Radford, Hull Number DD-446!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Radford, DD-446, part of the Fletcher-class! Hmm... and... even though I didn't do that well in the Kula Gulf and Kolombangara, I tried my best! Anyways, the only thing that matters at the end of the day is candy!
skins.acquisition: I'm Radford, a Fletcher-class destroyer. Want a lollipop, Commander?
skins.login: If my hunch is right, Commander's candy should be... Huh? Hey! There's nothing here!
skins.details: Commander, do you appreciate something sweet every now and then? Here, take whatever you like.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You really can't take the Sakura Empire's destroyer squadrons lightly!
skins.secretaryIdle2: If only everyone had lifetime supplies of candy, there wouldn't ever be another war!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, why don't we fire candy at the enemy instead of explosives?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hmpf! If you keep this up then I won't let you come to my room and eat candy anymore!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, the sweet magic within my tome lets me turn things into candy! Hehe, that sounds pretty convincing！ ...Eh, Commander? Wh-when'd you get here?!
